Text:
I was wondering if this included all the extras as I have downloaded one from a different uploader and one of the special features had been removed.  

I had the same issue from the same uploader with Hotel Transylvania.  Can you get that with English/Spanish audio and subs with no removed extras? 

Much appreciated.
@fishy84 I think we have downloaded the torrent from the same uploaded. I will RELOAD it sometime this month so be on the lookout for it.

Awesome!!!

I will show my appreciation by seeding as much as I can, thanks again.
@fishy84 Also I will upload Hotel Transylvania sometime in the future. So look out for that.
